Title: Fallout
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Erik Oleson
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Tagomi enlists Kido in a deception to save Japan from destruction. As Smith's life crumbles around him, he makes a dangerously bold play to hold onto his power. Joe tries to do the right ...
